name: SysToMath Portable C/C++ Libraries
short_description: The SysToMath portable C/C++ libraries and tools constitute a framework of operating system independent utilities aiding the development of software of any kind on both Win32 and POSIX based systems. See also http://SysToMath.com/etc/html/libraries.html
